Branch_Delete.title: Delete Revision
sqlselect: (select branch_desc from {schema}.v_my_branch_desc where branch_id=@branch_id and branch_access='RW') branch_name
sqlupdate: update {schema}.branch set branch_parent_id = null where branch_parent_id = @branch_id;
delete from {schema}.branch where branch_id = (select branch_id from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where branch_id=@branch_id and branch_access='RW');

fields.caption: ⚠ Warning
fields.value: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this revision?
